title: Ticket #4239: Node status file should show whether PRE/POST scripts are running
description: The node status file can be kind of confusing, because a node can be in the PRERUN state, but the script may not actually be running. This is especially confusing if you have a halt file, because a node can be in the PRERUN state, but the PRE script isn't running because of the halt file. And DAGMan can actually exit with the node in the PRERUN state. (See the job_dagman_final-I test.)
creator: wenger
